display_html:
data Channel m a = Channel {
  • send ∷ a → m ()
  • recv ∷ m (Maybe a)
}
name: Channel Channel send recv

display_html: hoistChannel ∷ (∀ x. m x → n x) → Channel m a → Channel n a
name: hoistChannel

display_html: isoKleisliChannel ∷ ∀ a b m. Monad m ⇒ (a → m b) → (b → m a) → Channel m a → Channel m b
name: isoKleisliChannel

display_html: fixedInputChannel ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ [a] → m (Channel m a)
name: fixedInputChannel

display_html: mvarsAsChannel ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ TMVar m a → TMVar m a → Channel m a
name: mvarsAsChannel

display_html: handlesAsChannel ∷ Handle → Handle → Channel IO ByteString
name: handlesAsChannel

display_html: createConnectedChannels ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ m (Channel m a, Channel m a)
name: createConnectedChannels

display_html: createConnectedBufferedChannels ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ Natural → m (Channel m a, Channel m a)
name: createConnectedBufferedChannels

display_html: createPipelineTestChannels ∷ MonadSTM m ⇒ Natural → m (Channel m a, Channel m a)
name: createPipelineTestChannels

display_html: channelEffect ∷ ∀ m a. Monad m ⇒ (a → m ()) → (Maybe a → m ()) → Channel m a → Channel m a
name: channelEffect

display_html: delayChannel ∷ (MonadSTM m, MonadTimer m) ⇒ DiffTime → Channel m a → Channel m a
name: delayChannel

display_html: loggingChannel ∷ (MonadSay m, Show id, Show a) ⇒ id → Channel m a → Channel m a
name: loggingChannel

display_html:
data Codec ps failure m bytes = Codec {
  • encode ∷ ∀ (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) (st' ∷ ps). PeerHasAgency pr st → Message ps st st' → bytes
  • decode ∷ ∀ (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps). PeerHasAgency pr st → m (DecodeStep bytes failure m (SomeMessage st))
}
name: Codec Codec encode decode

display_html: hoistCodec ∷ Functor n ⇒ (∀ x. m x → n x) → Codec ps failure m bytes → Codec ps failure n bytes
name: hoistCodec

display_html: isoCodec ∷ Functor m ⇒ (bytes → bytes') → (bytes' → bytes) → Codec ps failure m bytes → Codec ps failure m bytes'
name: isoCodec

display_html: mapFailureCodec ∷ Functor m ⇒ (failure → failure') → Codec ps failure m bytes → Codec ps failure' m bytes
name: mapFailureCodec

display_html:
data PeerRole
  • = AsClient
  • | AsServer
name: PeerRole AsClient AsServer

display_html:
data PeerHasAgency (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) ∷ ∀ ps. PeerRole → ps → Type where
  • ClientAgency ∷ ∀ ps (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps). !(ClientHasAgency st) → PeerHasAgency AsClient st
  • ServerAgency ∷ ∀ ps (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps). !(ServerHasAgency st) → PeerHasAgency AsServer st
name: PeerHasAgency ClientAgency ServerAgency

display_html: type WeHaveAgency (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) = PeerHasAgency pr st
name: WeHaveAgency

display_html: type TheyHaveAgency (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) = PeerHasAgency (FlipAgency pr) st
name: TheyHaveAgency

display_html:
data SomeMessage (st ∷ ps) ∷ ∀ ps. ps → Type where
  • SomeMessage ∷ ∀ ps (st ∷ ps) (st' ∷ ps). Message ps st st' → SomeMessage st
name: SomeMessage SomeMessage

display_html:
data CodecFailure
  • = CodecFailureOutOfInput
  • | CodecFailure String
name: CodecFailure CodecFailure CodecFailureOutOfInput

display_html:
data DecodeStep bytes failure m a
  • = DecodePartial (Maybe bytes → m (DecodeStep bytes failure m a))
  • | DecodeDone a (Maybe bytes)
  • | DecodeFail failure
name: DecodeStep DecodePartial DecodeDone DecodeFail

display_html: runDecoder ∷ Monad m ⇒ [bytes] → DecodeStep bytes failure m a → m (Either failure a)
name: runDecoder

display_html: runDecoderPure ∷ Monad m ⇒ (∀ b. m b → b) → m (DecodeStep bytes failure m a) → [bytes] → Either failure a
name: runDecoderPure

display_html:
data AnyMessage ps where
  • AnyMessage ∷ Message ps st st' → AnyMessage ps
name: AnyMessage AnyMessage

display_html:
data AnyMessageAndAgency ps where
  • AnyMessageAndAgency ∷ PeerHasAgency pr (st ∷ ps) → Message ps (st ∷ ps) (st' ∷ ps) → AnyMessageAndAgency ps
name: AnyMessageAndAgency AnyMessageAndAgency

display_html: prop_codecM ∷ ∀ ps failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage ps)) ⇒ Codec ps failure m bytes → AnyMessageAndAgency ps → m Bool
name: prop_codecM

display_html: prop_codec ∷ ∀ ps failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage ps)) ⇒ (∀ a. m a → a) → Codec ps failure m bytes → AnyMessageAndAgency ps → Bool
name: prop_codec

display_html: prop_codec_splitsM ∷ ∀ ps failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage ps)) ⇒ (bytes → [[bytes]]) → Codec ps failure m bytes → AnyMessageAndAgency ps → m Bool
name: prop_codec_splitsM

display_html: prop_codec_splits ∷ ∀ ps failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage ps)) ⇒ (bytes → [[bytes]]) → (∀ a. m a → a) → Codec ps failure m bytes → AnyMessageAndAgency ps → Bool
name: prop_codec_splits

display_html: prop_codec_binary_compatM ∷ ∀ psA psB failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage psA)) ⇒ Codec psA failure m bytes → Codec psB failure m bytes → (∀ pr (stA ∷ psA). PeerHasAgency pr stA → SamePeerHasAgency pr psB) → AnyMessageAndAgency psA → m Bool
name: prop_codec_binary_compatM

display_html: prop_codec_binary_compat ∷ ∀ psA psB failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage psA)) ⇒ (∀ a. m a → a) → Codec psA failure m bytes → Codec psB failure m bytes → (∀ pr (stA ∷ psA). PeerHasAgency pr stA → SamePeerHasAgency pr psB) → AnyMessageAndAgency psA → Bool
name: prop_codec_binary_compat

display_html:
data SamePeerHasAgency (pr ∷ PeerRole) (ps ∷ ★) where
  • SamePeerHasAgency ∷ ∀ (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps). PeerHasAgency pr st → SamePeerHasAgency pr ps
name: SamePeerHasAgency SamePeerHasAgency

display_html: runPeer ∷ ∀ ps (st ∷ ps) pr failure bytes m a. (MonadThrow m, Exception failure) ⇒ Tracer m (TraceSendRecv ps) → Codec ps failure m bytes → Channel m bytes → Peer ps pr st m a → m a
name: runPeer

display_html:
data TraceSendRecv ps where
  • TraceSendMsg ∷ AnyMessage ps → TraceSendRecv ps
  • TraceRecvMsg ∷ AnyMessage ps → TraceSendRecv ps
name: TraceSendRecv TraceSendMsg TraceRecvMsg

display_html: runPipelinedPeer ∷ ∀ ps (st ∷ ps) pr failure bytes m a. (MonadSTM m, MonadAsync m, MonadThrow m, Exception failure) ⇒ Tracer m (TraceSendRecv ps) → Codec ps failure m bytes → Channel m bytes → PeerPipelined ps pr st m a → m a
name: runPipelinedPeer

display_html: runConnectedPeers ∷ (MonadSTM m, MonadAsync m, MonadCatch m, Exception failure) ⇒ m (Channel m bytes, Channel m bytes) → Tracer m (PeerRole, TraceSendRecv ps) → Codec ps failure m bytes → Peer ps pr st m a → Peer ps (FlipAgency pr) st m b → m (a, b)
name: runConnectedPeers

display_html: runConnectedPeersPipelined ∷ (MonadSTM m, MonadAsync m, MonadCatch m, Exception failure) ⇒ m (Channel m bytes, Channel m bytes) → Tracer m (PeerRole, TraceSendRecv ps) → Codec ps failure m bytes → PeerPipelined ps pr st m a → Peer ps (FlipAgency pr) st m b → m (a, b)
name: runConnectedPeersPipelined

display_html: driverSimple ∷ ∀ ps failure bytes m. (MonadThrow m, Exception failure) ⇒ Tracer m (TraceSendRecv ps) → Codec ps failure m bytes → Channel m bytes → Driver ps (Maybe bytes) m
name: driverSimple

display_html: runDecoderWithChannel ∷ Monad m ⇒ Channel m bytes → Maybe bytes → DecodeStep bytes failure m a → m (Either failure (a, Maybe bytes))
name: runDecoderWithChannel

display_html:
data PingPong where
  • StIdle ∷ PingPong
  • StBusy ∷ PingPong
  • StDone ∷ PingPong
name: PingPong StDone StBusy StIdle

display_html:
data PingPongServer m a = PingPongServer {
  • recvMsgPing ∷ m (PingPongServer m a)
  • recvMsgDone ∷ a
}
name: PingPongServer PingPongServer recvMsgDone recvMsgPing

display_html: pingPongServerPeer ∷ Monad m ⇒ PingPongServer m a → Peer PingPong AsServer StIdle m a
name: pingPongServerPeer

display_html: codecPingPong ∷ ∀ m. Monad m ⇒ Codec PingPong CodecFailure m String
name: codecPingPong

display_html: decodeTerminatedFrame ∷ ∀ m a. Monad m ⇒ Char → (String → Maybe String → DecodeStep String CodecFailure m a) → m (DecodeStep String CodecFailure m a)
name: decodeTerminatedFrame

display_html:
data PingPongClient m a where
  • SendMsgPing ∷ m (PingPongClient m a) → PingPongClient m a
  • SendMsgDone ∷ a → PingPongClient m a
name: PingPongClient SendMsgPing SendMsgDone

display_html: pingPongClientPeer ∷ Monad m ⇒ PingPongClient m a → Peer PingPong AsClient StIdle m a
name: pingPongClientPeer

display_html:
data PingPongClientPipelined m a where
  • PingPongClientPipelined ∷ PingPongSender Z c m a → PingPongClientPipelined m a
name: PingPongClientPipelined PingPongClientPipelined

display_html:
data PingPongSender n c m a where
  • SendMsgPingPipelined ∷ m c → PingPongSender (S n) c m a → PingPongSender n c m a
  • CollectPipelined ∷ Maybe (PingPongSender (S n) c m a) → (c → PingPongSender n c m a) → PingPongSender (S n) c m a
  • SendMsgDonePipelined ∷ a → PingPongSender Z c m a
name: PingPongSender SendMsgPingPipelined CollectPipelined SendMsgDonePipelined

display_html: pingPongClientPeerPipelined ∷ Monad m ⇒ PingPongClientPipelined m a → PeerPipelined PingPong AsClient StIdle m a
name: pingPongClientPeerPipelined

display_html: pingPongServerStandard ∷ Applicative m ⇒ PingPongServer m ()
name: pingPongServerStandard

display_html: pingPongServerCount ∷ Applicative m ⇒ PingPongServer m Int
name: pingPongServerCount

display_html: pingPongClientFlood ∷ Applicative m ⇒ PingPongClient m a
name: pingPongClientFlood

display_html: pingPongClientCount ∷ Applicative m ⇒ Int → PingPongClient m ()
name: pingPongClientCount

display_html: pingPongClientPipelinedMax ∷ ∀ m. Monad m ⇒ Int → PingPongClientPipelined m [Either Int Int]
name: pingPongClientPipelinedMax

display_html: pingPongClientPipelinedMin ∷ ∀ m. Monad m ⇒ Int → PingPongClientPipelined m [Either Int Int]
name: pingPongClientPipelinedMin

display_html: pingPongClientPipelinedLimited ∷ ∀ m. Monad m ⇒ Int → Int → PingPongClientPipelined m [Either Int Int]
name: pingPongClientPipelinedLimited

display_html:
data ReqResp req resp where
  • StIdle ∷ ReqResp req resp
  • StBusy ∷ ReqResp req resp
  • StDone ∷ ReqResp req resp
name: ReqResp StDone StBusy StIdle

display_html:
data ReqRespServer req resp m a = ReqRespServer {
  • recvMsgReq ∷ req → m (resp, ReqRespServer req resp m a)
  • recvMsgDone ∷ m a
}
name: ReqRespServer ReqRespServer recvMsgReq recvMsgDone

display_html: reqRespServerPeer ∷ Monad m ⇒ ReqRespServer req resp m a → Peer (ReqResp req resp) AsServer StIdle m a
name: reqRespServerPeer

display_html: codecReqResp ∷ ∀ req resp m. (Monad m, Show req, Show resp, Read req, Read resp) ⇒ Codec (ReqResp req resp) CodecFailure m String
name: codecReqResp

display_html:
data ReqRespClient req resp m a where
  • SendMsgReq ∷ req → (resp → m (ReqRespClient req resp m a)) → ReqRespClient req resp m a
  • SendMsgDone ∷ m a → ReqRespClient req resp m a
name: ReqRespClient SendMsgDone SendMsgReq

display_html: reqRespClientPeer ∷ Monad m ⇒ ReqRespClient req resp m a → Peer (ReqResp req resp) AsClient StIdle m a
name: reqRespClientPeer

display_html:
data ReqRespClientPipelined req resp m a where
  • ReqRespClientPipelined ∷ ReqRespSender req resp Z c m a → ReqRespClientPipelined req resp m a
name: ReqRespClientPipelined ReqRespClientPipelined

display_html:
data ReqRespSender req resp n c m a where
  • SendMsgReqPipelined ∷ req → (resp → m c) → ReqRespSender req resp (S n) c m a → ReqRespSender req resp n c m a
  • CollectPipelined ∷ Maybe (ReqRespSender req resp (S n) c m a) → (c → ReqRespSender req resp n c m a) → ReqRespSender req resp (S n) c m a
  • SendMsgDonePipelined ∷ a → ReqRespSender req resp Z c m a
name: ReqRespSender CollectPipelined SendMsgDonePipelined SendMsgReqPipelined

display_html: reqRespClientPeerPipelined ∷ Monad m ⇒ ReqRespClientPipelined req resp m a → PeerPipelined (ReqResp req resp) AsClient StIdle m a
name: reqRespClientPeerPipelined

display_html: reqRespServerMapAccumL ∷ Monad m ⇒ (acc → req → m (acc, resp)) → acc → ReqRespServer req resp m acc
name: reqRespServerMapAccumL

display_html: reqRespClientMap ∷ Monad m ⇒ [req] → ReqRespClient req resp m [resp]
name: reqRespClientMap

display_html: reqRespClientMapPipelined ∷ ∀ req resp m. Monad m ⇒ [req] → ReqRespClientPipelined req resp m [resp]
name: reqRespClientMapPipelined
